entry.title: Submit your vet story
entry.summary: DOUGLAS COUNTY — The News-Review is seeking military service related story submissions for the 2023 Veterans Day special section.

entry.title: UCC offers credit monitoring after network breach
entry.summary: WINCHESTER — While there has been no evidence of misuse of personal data, Umpqua Community College is offering free credit monitoring for students and staff following “unusual activity on the UCC network” last month.

entry.title: Navigation Center guests coming indoors
entry.summary: The beds are in place, the bathrooms are spotless and the kitchen shelves are stocked with bags of rice and beans, as the Gary Leif Navigation Center in Roseburg is now ready to provide indoor housing to the homeless.

entry.title: DCSO seeks assistance in locating Michael Paul Scholes
entry.summary: DOUGLAS COUNTY — The Douglas County Sheriff’s Office is seeking help from the public in locating 47-year-old Michael Paul Scholes, who was reported missing on Sept. 15.

entry.title: Local students make honor roll at Oregon State University
entry.summary: CORVALLIS – A total of 3,385 students earned a B-plus (3.5) or better to make the scholastic honor roll for summer 2023 at Oregon State University.

entry.title: Back to school auto extravaganza

entry.title: Salmon Harbor Marina achieves milestone dredging project
entry.summary: WINCHESTER BAY — Douglas County Commissioners announced the successful completion of a historic dredging project at Salmon Harbor Marina on Friday.

entry.title: DCSO SEEKING HELP FINDING MISSING MAN
entry.summary: September 23, 2023 6:30 a.m. The Douglas County Sheriff’s Office is seeking help from the public in locating 47-year Michael Paul Scholes who was reported missing on September 15th. Lieutenant Brad O’Dell said associates report that Scholes hasn’t been heard from since June 17th. Scholes was last known to be living in his Dodge Caravan...

entry.title: Aviva Health CEO recognized by Oregon Primary Care Association
entry.summary: OREGON — Aviva Health CEO KC Bolton received the 2023 Award of Excellence in the Innovation and Transformation in Leadership category from the Oregon Primary Car Association on Tuesday, at the Fall All-peer Group Gathering in Eugene.

entry.title: Oakland School Bond on November ballot
entry.summary: OAKLAND — If the votes go their way, the Oakland School District is hoping to receive up to $6 million in bonds and a $4 million state grant for renovations.

entry.title: Fire level changes to moderate
entry.summary: DOUGLAS COUNTY — The Douglas Forest Protective Association is changing Public Use Restriction Levels to Moderate for all private, county, state and Bureau of Indian Affairs lands within the Douglas District, effective Saturday.

entry.summary: The National Weather Service issued a Flood Potential Outlook for flash flooding on area burn scars in Douglas and some nearby counties for early next week.

entry.title: CITY TO BEGIN ISSUING RESIDENTIAL BURN PERMITS
